name: The Shanti Project
description: Shanti Project exists to enhance the health, quality of life and well-being of people with terminal, life-threatening or disabling illnesses or conditions. Services include in-home and onsite patient and care navigation, emotional and practical support and preserving the human-animal bond.

Services include in-home and onsite patient and care navigation, emotional and practical support and preserving the human-animal bond.
